titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for certain committees for the 111th Congress.
A resolution making minority party appointments for certain committees for the 111th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes minority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Armed Services; (2) Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs; and (3) Veterans' Affairs.
